channel.title: Finntroll
channel.description: Anyone else here is a fan of Finntroll? In my opinion they are great. Especially the albums with their first vocalist Katla are great. Those albums are really Finntroll style, the new album "Ur Jordens Djup" isn't really like Finntroll used to be. It sounds too much like other Black Metal bands IMO. Not that it's bad or anything... Well, post what you think about Finntroll :D

item.title: Finntroll
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

You mean the name? No it isn’t, because in old story’s about Finland they talk about mysterious people living in Finland wich they called the Finntroll. At least that is what I read about it.

Read full topic

item.title: Finntroll
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

Hell yeah! Folk Metal is probably the coolest metal genre there is (except for Progressive metal)
Finntroll is funny because they sing in swedish when they are all finnish.
